div.p: Due to a scheduling conflict, the HIV education presentation for 8th & 12th grade students has been moved to March 11th. Please contact school nurse, Bethany Scott, if you have any questions.

div.p: Warner High School National Honor Society induction ceremony will be held in the high school cafeteria on Monday, February 24th at 6:00 PM. All parents and guardians of current NHS members as well as those of new NHS inductees are cordially invited. Cake and punch will be served after the ceremony.

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 14:53 pm CDT

td.span: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 66. North wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 44. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 73. Calm wind becoming southwest around 5 mph.
